settings.html:
<style>

        :root {
            --black: #000000;
            --white: #FFFFFF;
            --cream: #FAF6F0;
            --brown: #59473C;
            --accent: #4ECDC4;
            --warning: #F4D03F;
            --danger: #E74C3C;
            --border: 3px solid var(--black);
        }

        * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; }
        html { scroll-behavior: smooth; }
        body {
            font-family: 'Sometype Mono', monospace;
            background: var(--cream);
            color: var(--black);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; }

        /* STICKY TOC */
        .toc {
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 100;
            background: var(--black);
            border-bottom: var(--border);
            padding: 12px 0;
        }
        .toc-inner {
            display: flex;
            gap: 24px;
            overflow-x: auto;
            scrollbar-width: none;
        }
        .toc-inner::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; }
        .toc-link {
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 11px;
            font-weight: 600;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            white-space: nowrap;
            opacity: 0.7;
            transition: opacity 0.2s;
        }
        .toc-link:hover { opacity: 1; color: var(--accent); }

        /* HERO */
        .hero {
            background: var(--cream);
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .hero-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 400px;
            gap: 40px;
            align-items: start;
        }
        .hero-badges { display: flex; gap: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px; flex-wrap: wrap; }
        .badge {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
        }
        .badge--tier { background: var(--accent); }
        .badge--location { background: var(--white); }
        .badge--date { background: var(--warning); }
        .badge--distance { background: #FFB830; }
        .hero-title {
            font-size: 64px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: -0.02em;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .hero-tagline {
            font-size: 18px;
            font-style: italic;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 32px;
        }
        .hero-intro {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.8;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 32px;
            max-width: 540px;
        }

        /* SCORE CARD */
        .score-card {
            background: var(--brown);
            color: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .score-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .score-main {
            font-size: 80px;
            font-weight: 700;
            line-height: 1;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
        }
        .score-main span { font-size: 32px; opacity: 0.6; }
        .tier-label {
            font-size: 12px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .score-breakdown {
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            padding-top: 20px;
            margin-top: 20px;
        }
        .breakdown-row {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        .breakdown-label {
            font-size: 10px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            opacity: 0.7;
        }
        .breakdown-bar {
            flex: 1;
            height: 8px;
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            margin: 0 16px;
        }
        .breakdown-bar-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--accent); }
        .breakdown-score {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 600;
            min-width: 50px;
            text-align: right;
        }

        /* SECTIONS */
        .section {
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .section--dark { background: var(--brown); color: var(--white); }
        .section--black { background: var(--black); color: var(--white); }
        .section-header { margin-bottom: 40px; }
        .section-kicker {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 4px 12px;
            background: var(--warning);
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .section-kicker--dark {
            background: transparent;
            border-color: var(--white);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .section-title {
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .section-subtitle {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: var(--brown);
            max-width: 600px;
        }
        .section--dark .section-subtitle,
        .section--black .section-subtitle { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.7); }

        /* COURSE MAP */
        .map-container {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .map-embed {
            width: 100%;
            height: 500px;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            background: #f0f0f0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            font-size: 14px;
            color: var(--brown);
        }
        .map-stats {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
            margin-top: 24px;
        }

        /* STATS GRID */
        .stats-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .stats-grid--6 { grid-template-columns: repeat(6, 1fr); }
        .stat-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .stat-value { font-size: 28px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .stat-value--large { font-size: 36px; }
        .stat-label {
            font-size: 10px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--brown);
        }
        .stat-sublabel {
            font-size: 9px;
            color: var(--brown);
            opacity: 0.7;
            margin-top: 2px;
        }

        /* HISTORY TIMELINE */
        .timeline { margin-top: 32px; }
        .timeline-item {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 80px 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            padding: 20px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .timeline-item:last-child { border-bottom: none; }
        .timeline-year {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--accent);
        }
        .timeline-content { font-size: 13px; line-height: 1.6; }

        /* COURSE BREAKDOWN */
        .course-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .course-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .course-card--highlight {
            background: var(--danger);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .course-card--highlight .course-mile,
        .course-card--highlight .course-desc { color: rgba(255,255,255,0.85); }
        .course-mile {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .course-name {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        .course-desc {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: var(--brown);
            line-height: 1.6;
        }

        /* RATINGS */
        .rating-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
        }
        .rating-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .rating-card--dark {
            background: var(--brown);
            color: var(--white);
        }
        .rating-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .rating-score { font-size: 48px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .rating-score span { font-size: 20px; opacity: 0.6; }
        .rating-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .rating-metrics { display: grid; gap: 12px; }
        .rating-metric {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            font-size: 12px;
        }
        .rating-metric-label {
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            width: 100px;
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        .rating-metric-bar {
            flex: 1;
            height: 12px;
            background: #eee;
            border: 1px solid var(--black);
        }
        .rating-card--dark .rating-metric-bar {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
            border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.3);
        }
        .rating-metric-fill { height: 100%; background: var(--accent); }
        .rating-metric-value { font-weight: 700; width: 40px; text-align: right; }
        .rating-explanation {
            margin-top: 24px;
            padding-top: 24px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        .rating-card--dark .rating-explanation { border-top-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); }
        .rating-explanation p {
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 1.7;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        /* OPINION */
        .opinion-card {
            background: var(--accent);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 32px;
        }
        .opinion-verdict {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .opinion-title {
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .opinion-text { font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8; margin-bottom: 16px; }
        .opinion-list {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 24px;
            margin-top: 24px;
        }
        .opinion-col-title {
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        .opinion-col ul { list-style: none; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.8; }
        .opinion-col li { padding-left: 16px; position: relative; }
        .opinion-col li::before { content: ">"; position: absolute; left: 0; }

        /* BLACK PILL */
        .blackpill {
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 60px 0;
            border-bottom: var(--border);
        }
        .blackpill-badge {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 8px;
            padding: 6px 14px;
            border: 2px solid var(--white);
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.15em;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
        }
        .blackpill-title {
            font-size: 28px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
            max-width: 700px;
        }
        .blackpill-body {
            font-size: 14px;
            line-height: 1.8;
            opacity: 0.85;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .blackpill-quote {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-style: italic;
            border-left: 3px solid var(--accent);
            padding-left: 20px;
            margin: 32px 0;
            max-width: 600px;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }
        .forum-quote {
            background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
            padding: 20px;
            margin: 20px 0;
            font-size: 13px;
            line-height: 1.7;
        }
        .forum-quote cite {
            display: block;
            font-size: 10px;
            font-style: normal;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-top: 12px;
            opacity: 0.5;
        }

        /* VERDICT */
        .verdict-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .verdict-card { border: var(--border); padding: 24px; }
        .verdict-card--yes { background: var(--accent); }
        .verdict-card--no { background: var(--white); }
        .verdict-header {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        .verdict-list { list-style: none; }
        .verdict-list li {
            font-size: 13px;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
            padding-left: 20px;
            position: relative;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }
        .verdict-list li::before {
            content: ">";
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            font-weight: 700;
        }

        /* TRAINING PLANS */
        .plans-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 12px;
        }
        .plan-card {
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 20px 16px;
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            transition: transform 0.1s ease;
        }
        .plan-card:hover {
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 var(--black);
        }
        .plan-card--1 { background: var(--cream); }
        .plan-card--2 { background: #FFF8E1; }
        .plan-card--3 { background: var(--warning); }
        .plan-card--4 { background: #FFB830; }
        .plan-card--masters { background: var(--accent); }
        .plan-badge {
            position: absolute;
            top: -10px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            font-size: 8px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            padding: 2px 8px;
            white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .plan-title {
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            margin-bottom: 4px;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }
        .plan-desc {
            font-size: 10px;
            color: var(--brown);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            min-height: 2em;
        }
        .plan-hours { font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; margin-bottom: 12px; }
        .plan-cta {
            display: block;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            font-size: 10px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            border: 2px solid var(--black);
            transition: all 0.1s ease;
        }
        .plan-cta:hover { background: var(--brown); }

        /* LOGISTICS */
        .logistics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 16px;
        }
        .logistics-card {
            background: var(--white);
            border: var(--border);
            padding: 24px;
        }
        .logistics-icon {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            color: var(--accent);
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .logistics-title {
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        .logistics-value { font-size: 14px; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 4px; }
        .logistics-detail { font-size: 11px; color: var(--brown); line-height: 1.6; }

        /* TWO COL */
        .two-col { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 40px; }

        /* BUTTONS */
        .btn {
            display: inline-block;
            padding: 14px 28px;
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-size: 12px;
            font-weight: 700;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
            border: var(--border);
            transition: all 0.1s ease;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .btn:hover {
            background: var(--brown);
            transform: translate(-2px, -2px);
            box-shadow: 4px 4px 0 var(--black);
        }
        .btn--accent { background: var(--accent); color: var(--black); }
        .btn--outline { background: transparent; color: var(--black); }
        .btn--outline:hover { background: var(--black); color: var(--white); }

        /* FOOTER */
        .footer {
            background: var(--black);
            color: var(--white);
            padding: 40px 0;
            font-size: 11px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.1em;
        }
        .footer a { color: var(--accent); text-decoration: none; }

        /* RESPONSIVE */
        @media (max-width: 900px) {
            .hero-grid, .two-col, .rating-grid, .opinion-list { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .stats-grid, .course-grid, .verdict-grid, .logistics-grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
            .stats-grid--6, .map-stats { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
            .plans-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
            .hero-title { font-size: 40px; }
        }
    
</style>

TIER 1 / ICONIC STEAMBOAT SPRINGS, COLORADO June 28 (new June date, moved from August) 108 MI

SBT GRVL

"The altitude is the third discipline after fitness and mental fortitude."

The champagne gravel experience. Colorado's premier gravel weekend. Pioneer of gender pay parity in gravel racing.

GET YOUR TRAINING PLAN
Gravel God Rating
85/100
TIER 1 / HIGH CONSEQUENCE
Course Profile

[03] FACTS & HISTORY

How It Became THE Race

Literally sketched on a napkin in July 2018. Former pro cyclist Amy Charity and SmartWool CEO Mark Satkiewicz wanted 'the biggest, best gravel event in the world.' Sold out in 6 days. By 2020, sold out in 9 minutes.

The champagne gravel experience. Colorado's premier gravel weekend. Pioneer of gender pay parity in gravel racing.

Key Moments
2019 Inaugural race draws 2,000 riders from 7 countries, sells out in 6 days
2020 9-minute sellout before COVID cancellation
2022 Keegan Swenson wins SBT one day after winning Leadville 100 (LeadBoat)
2023 First sub-6-hour finish (Swenson 5:57:10)
2024 Community conflict forces format changes, nearly canceled
[04] THE COURSE

Key Moments on the Route

Fast and flowing on smooth gravel, punctuated by lung-busting climbs at altitude. The surface forgives; the elevation does not. The Black course at 108 miles is the premier distance.

Mile 30
Wahooligan Pass
15%+ pitches on loose gravel. Where overconfident starters blow up.
Mile 65
The Oxygen Debt Zone
Altitude fatigue compounds. Legs work, lungs don't.
Mile 90
Cow Creek Descent
Washboard and rocks when you're most fatigued. Where focus fails.
[05] THE RATINGS

Course Profile Analysis

Course Profile Score
26/35
RADAR BREAKDOWN
Length
4/5
Technicality
2/5
Elevation
4/5
Climate
3/5
Altitude
5/5
Adventure
4/5
Logistics
4/5
What Each Score Means

Length (4/5): 108 miles (2026 Black) is substantial but not ultra. At altitude, 108 miles feels like 130. Most age-groupers are looking at 6-9 hours in the saddle.

Technicality (2/5): Champagne gravel is the opposite of technical. Smooth, fast, forgiving. Cow Creek descent is the only section requiring real bike handling—and it comes at mile 90 when everyone's cooked.

Elevation (4/5): 8,189 feet of climbing with Wahooligan Pass hitting 15%+ grades. The climbing happens at altitude, which changes everything. A 6% grade at 7,500 feet feels like 8% at sea level.

Climate (3/5): June is more temperate than August, but Steamboat weather is never predictable. Morning starts in the 40s, afternoon finishes in the 80s. The temperature swing is the real challenge.

Altitude (5/5): This is THE defining factor. Start at 6,700 feet, top out over 8,500. Sea-level fitness means nothing here—everyone loses 10-15% power. The thin air doesn't care about your FTP.

Adventure (4/5): Stunning Colorado mountain scenery. Rolling ranch land, distant peaks, the Yampa Valley. Less remote than Unbound—aid stations are well-spaced and Steamboat is a proper town.

Logistics (4/5): Well-organized event with excellent aid stations. Steamboat is a real town with amenities. The lottery and lodging scramble are the only friction points.

[06] BIASED OPINION

The Verdict

SBT GRVL is what happens when smart people build a race from scratch with intention. Gender parity from day one. Champagne gravel that rewards fitness over bike handling. The altitude makes it hard; t

Editorial Profile
30/35

What Each Score Means

Prestige (5/5): America's #2 gravel race behind only Unbound. Sells out via lottery in minutes. Pioneer of gender pay parity. The race that proved Colorado gravel deserves a seat at the table.

Length (4/5): 108 miles (2026 Black) is substantial but not ultra. At altitude, 108 miles feels like 130. Most age-groupers are looking at 6-9 hours in the saddle.

Technicality (2/5): Champagne gravel is the opposite of technical. Smooth, fast, forgiving. Cow Creek descent is the only section requiring real bike handling—and it comes at mile 90 when everyone's cooked.

Elevation (4/5): 8,189 feet of climbing with Wahooligan Pass hitting 15%+ grades. The climbing happens at altitude, which changes everything. A 6% grade at 7,500 feet feels like 8% at sea level.

Climate (3/5): June is more temperate than August, but Steamboat weather is never predictable. Morning starts in the 40s, afternoon finishes in the 80s. The temperature swing is the real challenge.

Altitude (5/5): This is THE defining factor. Start at 6,700 feet, top out over 8,500. Sea-level fitness means nothing here—everyone loses 10-15% power. The thin air doesn't care about your FTP.

Adventure (4/5): Stunning Colorado mountain scenery. Rolling ranch land, distant peaks, the Yampa Valley. Less remote than Unbound—aid stations are well-spaced and Steamboat is a proper town.

Logistics (4/5): Well-organized event with excellent aid stations. Steamboat is a real town with amenities. The lottery and lodging scramble are the only friction points.

[X] THE BLACK PILL

THE THING NOBODY TELLS YOU

SBT GRVL's prestige comes with asterisks. The altitude advantage is real—Colorado locals and athletes with altitude access have a measurable edge that no amount of sea-level training can match. The lottery system means committed athletes get rejected while casual participants get lucky. And the June date change means racing in a different season with different fitness peaks.

  • If you're a sea-level athlete, you're racing at 85-90% of your capacity. That's not mental—it's physiological.
  • The lottery means you can't plan your season around SBT. You enter and hope.
  • Steamboat lodging during race week is expensive. $250/night for basic rooms. $400+ for anything nice.
"SBT GRVL is a fantastic race that rewards proper preparation and punishes assumptions. If you're not prepared for altitude, you'll finish—but you won't race. The champagne gravel is real, the communit"
[07] FINAL VERDICT

Is This Race For You?

[+] Race This If:
  • The surface: Champagne gravel is real. Smooth, fast, golden. You can run narrow tires and trust them.
  • The community: Amy Charity's vision of inclusion isn't marketing—it's embedded in every decision.
  • The town: Steamboat Springs is a proper ski town with restaurants, lodging, culture.
  • The BOCO hats: Stupid-simple finisher swag that actually means something.
[-] Skip This If:
  • The lottery: Demand far exceeds supply. You can train all year and not get in.
  • The altitude: If you're a sea-level athlete without altitude access, you're at a real disadvantage.
  • The drama: Community conflict with ranchers nearly killed the race. The wounds aren't fully healed.
  • The cost: $295 entry + Steamboat lodging + flights to Hayden. This isn't a cheap weekend.
